blog.name: mackmeta
blog.title: Meta, Analysis, and Speculation
blog.description: I'm Dave (he/him). I'm a fan of Andi Mack, Riverdale, and Girl Meets World, and other shows and movies. Feel free to send me asks!

summary: Ratings are in- 904k. Not 1m but way higher than Fridays Ravens Home which only got 740k!
question: Ratings are in- 904k. Not 1m but way higher than Fridays Ravens Home which only got 740k!
answer:
Let’s not grade on a curve anon. Andi Mack’s ratings are objectively awful. Little over a year ago S2 premiered to 1.62 million viewers, the mid-season finale which aired in February got 1.39 million viewers, the 2b premiere got 1.13 million viewers, and even the S2 finale got 1.045 million viewers. 

Yes Andi Mack still does better than other shows and yes all Disney channel shows have suffered a decline in ratings but that’s cold comfort when Andi Mack which is Disney’s best show by far can’t even crack a million viewers for it’s S3 premiere. I’m almost certain that Disney never intended to air 3a in 2018 and it was only the collapse in ratings over the summer that spooked them into bringing back S3 after a less than two month hiatus. I think that was a very wise decision, if they had delayed S3 until January who knows how much more of the audience would have permanently left. 

I can’t say I’m surprised at the low ratings though. That S3 promo was released far too late and was far too angsty and depressing. It was not a promo designed to bring in new viewers or keep little kids watching. Nor did Disney properly promote the show at all. It’s great that they had the cast do a tumblr ask session but we’ll all be watching the show till the bitter end regardless. 

If the ratings keep tanking over the next few weeks I wonder if Disney will be panicked enough to break the glass on actually promoting Tyrus. Delaying Tyrus until ep 5 screws them over for October but if they’re desperate enough they may really start hyping it in November. It would be a wise choice, Tyrus is the story line that really sets Andi Mack apart. If I wanted to watch a poorly written love triangle pitting two girls against each other I could just re-watch GMW and if I wanted to watch a will they won’t they Jandi style relationship I could watch literally every other teen show ever made. On the bright side, if the ratings actually rise a bit during Tyrus episodes it may give Terri a bit more leverage as she writes the final episodes and maybe some more Tyrus scenes get approved than would have otherwise.

title: 31 Days of Andi Mack
body:
Day 10: What character do you most identify with?

I feel like I have a little bit of most of them. Andi’s love for handcrafting, Cyrus’s clumsiness and the fact we’re not sporty people, Buffy’s ability to reject her crush, Jonah’s anxiety and bisexuality, Bex’s style, Cece’s temper, TJ’s attitude, Bowie’s hair length (idk xd), etc…

tags: they should have just made andi still be happy with jonah then find out he has a panic attack that way she wont feel guilty
summary: The way they’re handling Jandi is so messy. It was a bad call to have Andi say she moved on from Jonah bc then the next ep he’s...
body: The way they’re handling Jandi is so messy. It was a bad call to have Andi say she moved on from Jonah bc then the next ep he’s most likely gonna have another panic attack and I don’t want Andi to feel guilty or feel obligated to stay with him. I don’t want her to feel trapped in a relationship she doesn’t want to be in.

reblog.comment: The way they’re handling Jandi is so messy. It was a bad call to have Andi say she moved on from Jonah bc then the next ep he’s most likely gonna have another panic attack and I don’t want Andi to feel guilty or feel obligated to stay with him. I don’t want her to feel trapped in a relationship she doesn’t want to be in.

trail.content_raw: The way they’re handling Jandi is so messy. It was a bad call to have Andi say she moved on from Jonah bc then the next ep he’s most likely gonna have another panic attack and I don’t want Andi to feel guilty or feel obligated to stay with him. I don’t want her to feel trapped in a relationship she doesn’t want to be in.
trail.content: The way they’re handling Jandi is so messy. It was a bad call to have Andi say she moved on from Jonah bc then the next ep he’s most likely gonna have another panic attack and I don’t want Andi to feel guilty or feel obligated to stay with him. I don’t want her to feel trapped in a relationship she doesn’t want to be in.

summary: again, don’t usually participate in these kinds of things cause... lazy but... if today’s 31 days of andi mack is who i most...
body:
again, don’t usually participate in these kinds of things cause… lazy but…

if today’s 31 days of andi mack is who i most identify with i gotta quickly give my boy Cyrus a s/o for literally being the male more gay me. 

i am constantly nervous and awkward and anxious and punny and nerdy and also uh he’s gay and im bi so worm! literally any time he does anything i’m like… why is that actually something i’ve done. 

so there ya have it

also gotta give an honorable mention to jonah’s anxiety storyline being the one on the show i most relate to

blog.name: i-am-beyoutiful
blog.title: My Oh So Crazy Life
blog.description: I love a lot of different things. This blog is a compilation of all of them. Get ready for the craziness that is my brain at work #nerdnation

body:
#31DaysOfAndiMack Day 10

Prompt: What Character do you most identify with?

Definitely Buffy freakin Driscol!! When I come to sport and videos games I can get really competitive. I have a very brash and bold personality but if I include you in my personal group of friends I will defend you, always. Just like Buffy I did have some problems accepting my hair but I was able to move past that and learn to not only love my hair but also myself. I adore Buffy’s confidence in her abilities and herself

blog.description: Nikko. 18. He/Him. Bi/pan. I now take requests!

summary: I am a queer man, so I obviously focus on mlm stuff more, but even though it was great to hear that Josh ships Tyrus, it was...
body: I am a queer man, so I obviously focus on mlm stuff more, but even though it was great to hear that Josh ships Tyrus, it was also amazing to hear he ships Ambi! He always made it obvious he liked Tyrus but we finally get someone openly gunning for Andi living her best sapphic life! Amazing.

reblog.comment: I am a queer man, so I obviously focus on mlm stuff more, but even though it was great to hear that Josh ships Tyrus, it was also amazing to hear he ships Ambi! He always made it obvious he liked Tyrus but we finally get someone openly gunning for Andi living her best sapphic life! Amazing.

trail.content_raw: I am a queer man, so I obviously focus on mlm stuff more, but even though it was great to hear that Josh ships Tyrus, it was also amazing to hear he ships Ambi! He always made it obvious he liked Tyrus but we finally get someone openly gunning for Andi living her best sapphic life! Amazing.
trail.content: I am a queer man, so I obviously focus on mlm stuff more, but even though it was great to hear that Josh ships Tyrus, it was also amazing to hear he ships Ambi! He always made it obvious he liked Tyrus but we finally get someone openly gunning for Andi living her best sapphic life! Amazing.

blog.title: ScatterbrainUK
blog.description: Randomness at its weirdest lol

summary: Theory about the blonde guy and how he affects Tyrus
title: Theory about the blonde guy and how he affects Tyrus
body:
So a lot of people have been assuming the blond guy from the trailer is a new love interest for Cyrus given how he is smiling at Cyrus and how TJ looks “jealous”. But given an interview with Sofia where she mentions an episode will revolve around Cyrus and an issue that will have a “very important message to get across  in our day an age” it has me wondering that if the blond boy (anyone got a name for him yet?) is in THAT episode maybe we have misread the trailer entirely. 

Lets be frank: america has come along way but its still heavy with homophobic violence and parties built on making LGBTQ people suffer. whats a good way to show that this is not right to a younger audience and make them aware of their own actions towards others, LGBTQ or otherwise? have a watered down version be a threat to a character on their show. by watered down i mean verbally attacking Cyrus without using the words that THEY use in real life but still implying his sexuality in a negative way. Maybe thats what the blond guy is, a bully who has guessed Cyrus’s sexuality and is mocking him in front of TJ, who took cyrus to the rally. Cyrus looking for support turns to TJ but he does nothing,  causing cyrus that hurt look as he looks back at blonde guy realizing he is all alone dealing with this. this way the young audience is shown both the horrible situation someone being attacked this way is in and how doing nothing to aid the victim makes them a part of the bullying by allowing it to happen. they can then question if they have ever done anything like this or what they would do if they saw it happening to someone they knew.  this could also be the cause of the look in the cafeteria: a friendship damaged by TJ not helping his friend when he needed him the most, perhaps out of fear he would then become a target by association with Cyrus. Cyrus does look the more hurt out of the two in that scene. 

That situation is pretty dark for a Disney show but then this is Andi Mack, a show thats pushing alot of topics not handled by kids shows. 


Another theory i havent really seen thats a little bit lighter than my other theory is that maybe Blond guy is either TJ’s boyfriend or ex. Maybe TJ and blond guy got together before he and cyrus even became good friends and TJ had been keeping him a secret because either a) their still together or b) he’s still trying to figure cyrus out and waiting to come out to him. then they meet Blond guy at the rally and TJ is not only possibly outed by him to cyrus but reveals their relationship which might cause cyrus’s hurt look: the guy he has been crushing on kept not only his sexuality a secret but also that he was in a relationship. i think this one is less likely but dont think many people would see it coming. 

personally i hope it is that cyrus now has 2 guys interested in him as a lot of people seem to have taken the trailer that way (myself included first time i watched it). but the fact theirs going to be a Cyrus centered episode can only be a good thing whatever subject matter they tackle, boy troubles or not.

blog.name: taniamarie-16
blog.title: Hello Everyone ❤️
blog.description:
Pastors Daughter, Dog Groomer, Vet Tech, Author 🐱🐶📖

Vet Tech, Groomer, Author 🐶🐱

summary: I’m sorry how did this happen?
body:
I’m sorry how did this happen?

I told myself I was done with Disney.

Then Girl Meets World aired and I was like okay, I’m 18. It’s cool to watch this.

Then it ended. And I’m like okay. I’m 21 now. Time to move on from Disney.

Stupid.

I was stupid.

Andi Mack aired and I’m sorry not sorry that I’m 23 and in love with that show.
